codeBlocks.content:
Opera Bookmarks

Godot XR (VR / AR / MR)

Core Documentation

Godot Docs - XR index (stable)
Godot Docs - Setting up XR (4.4)
Godot Docs - Deploying to Android (Quest/Pico etc.)
Godot Docs - OpenXR Settings (4.4)
Godot Docs - XR action map (4.4)
Godot Docs - Room scale in XR (4.4)
Godot Docs - Basic XR Locomotion (stable)
Godot Docs - AR / Passthrough (stable)
Godot Docs - OpenXR passthrough (4.2)
Godot Docs - OpenXR hand tracking (stable)
Godot Docs - OpenXR body tracking (stable)
Godot Docs - OpenXR composition layers (latest)
Godot Docs - XR full screen effects (stable)
Godot Docs - OpenXR spatial entities (markers / QR / etc.) (latest)
Godot Class Docs - OpenXRInterface (4.5)
Godot Docs - OpenXR composition layers (4.5)
Godot Class Docs - XRAnchor3D (AR anchors)
Godot Class Docs - XRHandModifier3D (drive hands from tracking)
Godot Class Docs - OpenXRExtensionWrapper (implement OpenXR extensions via GDExtension)

XR Tools and Templates

Godot Asset Library - Godot XR Tools for Godot 4
GitHub - GodotVR/godot-xr-tools
Godot XR Tools - Installation docs
Godot XR Tools - Hand Poses docs
Godot Asset Library - Godot XR Template
GitHub - GodotVR/godot-xr-template
Maaack's XR Template (With Menus/Settings)
Godot XR Multiplayer Template
itch.io - Godot XR Community (tools, demos, jams)
itch.io - Godot XR Tools Tutorial Demo
itch.io - Godot XR Game Jam (main page)
itch.io - Godot XR Game Jam (Feb 2025)
itch.io - Godot XR Game Jam (Sep 2025)

OpenXR Vendors Plugin

OpenXR Loaders (Meta, Pico, HTC) - AssetLib
Godot Asset Library - Godot OpenXR Vendors plugin v4 (Godot 4.4+)
Godot Asset Library - Godot OpenXR Vendors plugin v3 (Godot 4.3+)
GitHub - GodotVR/godot_openxr_vendors
Vendors Plugin Docs - Obtaining/Downloading
Vendors Plugin Docs - Installation
Vendors Plugin Docs - Hybrid Apps (panel + immersive)
Vendors Plugin Docs - Meta Passthrough
Godot Asset Library (mirror) - Meta Passthrough XR Sample
Vendors Plugin Docs - Meta Scene Manager
Vendors Plugin Docs - Meta Spatial Anchors
Godot Asset Library - Meta Scene XR Sample (scene mesh + anchors)

Meta Platform SDK and Toolkit

Godot Asset Library - Godot Meta Toolkit
Godot Meta Toolkit - Documentation home
Godot Meta Toolkit - Platform SDK Getting Started
Godot Engine Blog - Godot XR update (Feb 2025)
Godot Engine Blog - What's New in Android and XR (GodotCon 2025 recap)

XR Editor

Godot Docs - Using the XR editor (4.4)
Godot Blog - Godot Editor on the Meta Horizon Store (early access)
Meta Horizon Store - Godot Game Engine (XR editor app)
Godot Downloads - Android (includes editor APK downloads)
GitHub - godotengine/godot-builds releases (includes XR editor alpha builds mentioned for Pico)

AR / MR / Passthrough

GitHub - GodotVR/godot_arcore (ARCore plugin)
GodotVision - Build visionOS apps with Godot (Godot backend + RealityKit frontend)
GodotVision (Apple Vision Pro / visionOS Support)
GitHub - Jules-NC/GodotARKit (ARKit Live Link Face / facial mocap)
Godot Asset Library (mirror) - GodotARKit (facial mocap)
GitHub - VisualAnchors (QR-code world anchors for Quest / Android)
Passthrough Tools (Mixed Reality)

WebXR

WebXR Export Documentation
Snopek Games - WebXR in Godot (tutorials + talks)
Godot Asset Library (mirror) - Godot WebXR Template
GitHub - Immersive Web Emulator (Meta Quest device emulation for WebXR)
GitHub - MozillaReality/WebXR-emulator-extension (inactive, but useful reference)

Hand Tracking and Interaction

Nokee (Hand Tracking and UI Framework)
Godot XR Hand Poser
Godot XR Avatar (IK System)
Godot Asset Library - XR Kit (physics hands, gesture recognition, smoothing, cinematic view)
GitHub - patrykkalinowski/godot-xr-kit
Gadget Mirror - Godot XR Autohands (gesture-to-controller events)
Godot Asset Library (mirror) - Godot XR Hand Pose Detector
Godot Asset Library - Godot XR Handtracking Toolkit

In-Engine Tools

Snappy (Level Design inside VR)
Material Maker (Includes VR Painting Mode)

OpenXR Specs and Developer Tools

Khronos - OpenXR Registry (specs, extensions, repos)
GitHub - KhronosGroup/OpenXR-SDK (headers + loader)
GitHub - KhronosGroup/OpenXR-SDK-Source (loader + layers + hello_xr)
GitHub - OpenXR Explorer (runtime switcher + capabilities explorer)
Monado - Open source OpenXR runtime (homepage)
Monado Docs - About OpenXR runtimes
Microsoft Learn - OpenXR (Mixed Reality / HoloLens / WMR context)

Platform Ecosystem

Android Developers - Android XR for Godot
Steamworks Docs - Steam Frame OpenXR + Godot

Learning and Community

Bastiaan Olij (Godot VR Maintainer) YouTube
Dilmer Valecillos (XR Tutorials)
Snopek Games (WebXR and Multiplayer)
Godot Engine - Community page
Godot Docs - Community channels (stable)
Discord - Godot Engine (official server listing)

Meta Platform SDK and Toolkit

Hand Tracking and Interaction

Godot XR Hand Poser

data.text:
Created `C:\Users\user\Downloads\Godot-Bookmarks-Combined.html` with:

- **12 categories** organized logically (Core Documentation, XR Tools and Templates, OpenXR Vendors Plugin, Meta Platform SDK, XR Editor, AR/MR/Passthrough, WebXR, Hand Tracking, In-Engine Tools, OpenXR Specs, Platform Ecosystem, Learning and Community)
- **~80 unique links** merged from both source files
- **4 duplicates removed** (XR docs index, godot-xr-tools, godot-xr-template, godot_openxr_vendors)
- Opera-compatible Netscape Bookmark format with proper `DOCTYPE`, `META`, and nested `DL/DT/A` structure

You can import this directly into Opera via **Bookmarks > Import bookmarks and settings > Bookmarks HTML file**.

data.richText:
Implement the plan as specified, it is attached for your reference. Do NOT edit the plan file itself.

To-do's from the plan have already been created. Do not create them again. Mark them as in_progress as you work, starting with the first one. Don't stop until you have completed all the to-dos.
data.text:
Implement the plan as specified, it is attached for your reference. Do NOT edit the plan file itself.

To-do's from the plan have already been created. Do not create them again. Mark them as in_progress as you work, starting with the first one. Don't stop until you have completed all the to-dos.

selections.text:
# Merge Godot XR Bookmark Files

## Approach

Merge both files into a single Opera-compatible bookmark file (Netscape Bookmark format), deduplicating URLs and organizing into a unified category structure.

## Proposed Structure

```
Godot XR (VR / AR / MR)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ Core Documentation (from File 2's extensive docs section)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ XR Tools & Templates (merged from both files)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ OpenXR Vendors Plugin (File 2)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ Meta Platform SDK & Toolkit (File 2)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ XR Editor (File 2)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ AR / MR / Passthrough (merged - File 1 has passthrough, File 2 has AR)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ WebXR (File 2)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ Hand Tracking & Interaction (merged from both)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ In-Engine Tools (File 1 - Snappy, Material Maker)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ OpenXR Specs & Developer Tools (File 2)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ Platform Ecosystem (File 2 - Android XR, Steam)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ Learning & Community (merged from both)
```

## Deduplication

These URLs appear in both files and will be kept once:
- `https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/tutorials/xr/index.html`
- `https://github.com/GodotVR/godot-xr-tools`
- `https://github.com/GodotVR/godot-xr-template`
- `https://github.com/GodotVR/godot_openxr_vendors`

## Output

Create `[Godot-Bookmarks-Combined.html](Godot-Bookmarks-Combined.html)` in `C:\Users\user\Downloads\` using Opera's Netscape Bookmark format with proper `DOCTYPE`, `META`, and nested `DL/DT/A` structure.
selections.rawText:
# Merge Godot XR Bookmark Files

## Approach

Merge both files into a single Opera-compatible bookmark file (Netscape Bookmark format), deduplicating URLs and organizing into a unified category structure.

## Proposed Structure

```
Godot XR (VR / AR / MR)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ Core Documentation (from File 2's extensive docs section)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ XR Tools & Templates (merged from both files)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ OpenXR Vendors Plugin (File 2)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ Meta Platform SDK & Toolkit (File 2)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ XR Editor (File 2)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ AR / MR / Passthrough (merged - File 1 has passthrough, File 2 has AR)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ WebXR (File 2)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ Hand Tracking & Interaction (merged from both)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ In-Engine Tools (File 1 - Snappy, Material Maker)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ OpenXR Specs & Developer Tools (File 2)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ Platform Ecosystem (File 2 - Android XR, Steam)
Γö£ΓöÇΓöÇ Learning & Community (merged from both)
```
